heroMain.description: As a software engineer, I use my technical expertise and skills to build and maintain high-quality software systems. My passion for technology drives me to constantly learn and grow, and I strive to create solutions that have a positive impact on the world.

info.title: About Me
info.description1: I have always been passionate about technology and its ability to change the world. After completing my degree in computer science, I began my career as a web developer. I quickly learned the ins and outs of front-end development and was able to create beautiful, functional websites for a variety of clients.
info.description2: As I gained more experience, I began to explore other areas of development, including mobile and backend development. This allowed me to expand my skillset and work on even more exciting projects.
info.description3: Throughout my career, I have always been driven by a desire to learn and grow as a developer. I am constantly seeking out new technologies and techniques to improve my craft. I am excited to see where my passion for technology takes me next.

0.title: Computer Engineer
0.description: Currently completing a degree while balancing academic and extracurricular responsibilities

1.title: IT technician
1.description: Skilled in maintaining and troubleshooting computer systems and networks

2.title: Mobile Developer at Telo
2.description: Proficient in creating software applications for mobile devices, consistently delivering high-quality products.

3.title: Web Developer at Musa
3.description: Experienced in designing, developing, and maintaining websites and web applications.

skills.title: Areas of Expertise
skills.subtitle: Skills
skills.description: I have a diverse skill set, developed through my education and professional experiences.
skills.aux: I am constantly seeking to learn and improve my skills, and I am always open to new opportunities to challenge myself and grow professionally.

soft-skills.subtitle: Skills
soft-skills.title: Soft Skills
soft-skills.description: In addition to my technical skills, I also possess a range of soft skills that have helped me succeed in my career
soft-skills.aux: I believe that these skills are just as important as technical expertise, and I work hard to continually develop and improve them. I am confident that my strong communication, problem-solving, and teamwork skills make me a valuable asset to any team or project.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: I like to work in a team, I am always willing to learn from others and share my knowledge.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: I am a good communicator, I like to share my ideas and listen to others.

problem-solving.title: Problem Solving
problem-solving.description: I like to solve problems, I am always looking for the best solution.

goal-oriented.title: Goal Oriented
goal-oriented.description: I am a person who likes to set goals and achieve them.

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: I am always willing to adapt to new technologies, languages, libraries and frameworks.

time-management.title: Time Management
time-management.description: I am a person who likes to organize my time, I am always looking for the best way to do things.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: I am a creative person, I like to think outside the box and come up with new ideas.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: I am a person who likes to lead, I like to take the initiative and be responsible for the tasks I am assigned.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: I am a person who likes to organize, I like to have everything in order.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.description: I am a responsible person, I like to take care of the tasks I am assigned.

initiative.title: Initiative
initiative.description: I am a person who likes to take the initiative, I like to be proactive and always be looking for new challenges.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: I am a committed person, I like to finish the tasks I am assigned.

portfolio.description: I am proud of the work I have completed throughout my career.
